input_text:
Job Title: Night Janitor

Location: Lynnwood, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Quail Park of Lynnwood is a vibrant senior living community located in Lynnwood, WA.

10pm - 6:30am Night Shift
Night Janitor | Security Guard | Janitorial Job Description Routinely makes walking rounds throughout each building and the entire grounds of the community observing for any non-routine items, individuals, or occurrences that may interfere with normal community operations during non-business hoursMakes verbal contact with each night team member routinely throughout the shift, ensuring that everything is in order in each area of the communityResponds to the needs of residents, families, visitors, and team members by providing immediate assistanceDocuments findings of rounds in the Security Log Book, noting anything observed that was non-routine in natureIn coordination with a Care Partner, provides hands-on transfer assistance on the infrequent occasion where a resident requires two person transfer assistance during night-time hoursAnswers resident emergency call systemProvides back-up assistance to community team members during building or resident emergencies including first aid and call emergency medical assistance or other urgent resident situations
Night Janitor | Security Guard | Janitorial Benefits OfferedPaid time offHealth insurance (for full time) Dental insurance (for full time) Retirement benefits or accountsEducation assistance or tuition reimbursementWorkplace perks such as meal and coffeeVariable schedule options 
Night Janitor | Security Guard | Janitorial Minimum RequirementsOne year of previous experience in facility security services preferredPrevious experience in a senior living setting also preferredMust be able to exercise good judgment in emergency situationsCompetency in organizational and time management skills with the ability to handle multiple prioritiesMust possess strong customer service and interpersonal communication skills and enjoy working with seniorsAbility to read, comprehend, write, and speak English to interpret written instructions such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions and procedure manuals, and to communicate effectively with residents, families, and other team membersMust have basic computer skills, including Word and ExcelHave the strength and endurance required for standing, walking, bending, lifting and pushingMust meet all health-related requirements pertaining to state licensureMust maintain current CPR/First Aid credentialsSubject to pre-employment screening including physical, drug and TB testing and criminal background check

Starting Wage $16.28- $18 per hour Night Shift
PM21
Powered by JazzHR 
PI239186480

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Night Janitor
output_json.summary: Night Janitor position at Quail Park of Lynnwood, a senior living community in Lynnwood, WA.
job_responsibilities: Makes walking rounds throughout each building and the entire grounds of the community observing for any non-routine items, individuals, or occurrences that may interfere with normal community operations during non-business hours.
Responds to the needs of residents, families, visitors, and team members by providing immediate assistance.
Documents findings of rounds in the Security Log Book, noting anything observed that was non-routine in nature.
In coordination with a Care Partner, provides hands-on transfer assistance on the infrequent occasion where a resident requires two person transfer assistance during night-time hours.
Provides back-up assistance to community team members during building or resident emergencies including first aid and call emergency medical assistance or other urgent resident situations.
output_json.physical_requirements: Must meet all health-related requirements pertaining to state licensure. Must maintain current CPR/First Aid credentials. Subject to pre-employment screening including physical, drug and TB testing and criminal background check.
benefits: Workplace perks such as meal and coffee
output_json.company_information: Quail Park of Lynnwood is a vibrant senior living community located in Lynnwood, WA.

other.content: One year of previous experience in facility security services preferred. Previous experience in a senior living setting also preferred. Must be able to exercise good judgment in emergency situations. Competency in organizational and time management skills with the ability to handle multiple priorities. Must possess strong customer service and interpersonal communication skills and enjoy working with seniors. Ability to read, comprehend, write, and speak English to interpret written instructions such as safety rules, operating and maintenance instructions and procedure manuals, and to communicate effectively with residents, families, and other team members. Must have basic computer skills, including Word and Excel. Have the strength and endurance required for standing, walking, bending, lifting, and pushing.
